Finally, stakeholder engagement should not exclude scientists in the country or region who have experience leading clinical trials during health disasters, such as those involved with the design and implementation of the Ebola ring vaccine trial in West Africa in 2014, which proved a game changer in ending the outbreak. Stakeholders should also include the private sector and philanthropists who have played significant roles in the containment of the COVID‐19 pandemic in the region.
